sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import data from "../data"; export default function ProductScreen(props) { /* find function -> is an array function that finds the element based on the criteria that we define. I'm searching for the id of the product and match with the id that is passed on the ProductScreen. "x._id" will find the product and then make the comparison with the product passes. props.match.params.id is the value that the user passes in the route "/product/:id" */ const product = data.products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); return (

  • {product.name}

  • Price : ${product.price}
  • Description :

    {product.description}

); }
